items.title: Caterpillar Inc. (CAT): “You’re Making A Lot Of Money” If You’re Involved In AI Build Out, Says Jim Cramer
items.description: We recently published 14 Stocks Jim Cramer Discussed As He Talked About Record Bitcoin Price. Caterpillar Inc. (NYSE:CAT) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer recently discussed. Caterpillar Inc. (NYSE:CAT) is one of the largest agricultural and construction equipment providers in the world. Typically, this means that the stock’s performance is tied to the economy, […]
